price: 48. Dieną, kai jie bus nutempti veidais į Ugnį (jiems bus pasakyta): „Ragaukite Pragaro prisilietimą!“
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُسۡحَبُونَ فِي ٱلنَّارِ عَلَىٰ وُجُوهِهِمۡ ذُوقُواْ مَسَّ سَقَرَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma yus'ḥabūna fī al-nāri ʿalā wujūhihim dhūqū massa saqara
